tool_description: Generate random personal data such as name, phone number, email, address, credit card information, location, profession, etc...
name: Generate Random Personal Data
title: Generate Random Personal Data

api_list.name: getPersons
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://generate-random-personal-data.p.rapidapi.com/get_persons/2/en_US/us"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "generate-random-personal-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://generate-random-personal-data.p.rapidapi.com/get_persons/{total}/{locale}/{country_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "generate-random-personal-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
